summary:
NOTE: All containers, Inside and Outside of the house are safe!

Location: Eastern Border of Winterhold, slightly North-East of Windhelm.

Costs: Nothing.

Remember, Please Rate! Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
---------------------------- WHITEWIND HOME -   v.7
---------------------------
---------------------------
UNIQUE CONTAINERS
---------------------------

- Shoes
- Custom Wall Safes & 1 Mounted Cabinet
- Alcohol Bottles
- Cuts of Meat
- Bread Loaves
- Cheese Shelf
- Books
- (New!) Firebrand Wine Case
- (New!) Potions Shelf
- (New!) Poisons Shelf
- (New!) Spell Tomes
- (New!) Scrolls
- (New!) Staff Crate
- (New!) Gold Coin Chest
- (New!) Golden Bowl of Jewels
- (New!) Stacks of Gold Ingots
- (New!) Sacks of Flour
- (New!) Shelf of Honeycomb
- (New!) Wine Rack
- (New!) Bowl of Eggs
- (New!) Baked Goods
- (New!) Tool Box

---------------------------
OTHER FEATURES
---------------------------

- A Greenhouse, complete with up to 23  Plots for growin' your own crops! (NEW!)
- Hearthfires Cooking Oven/Stove (NEW!)
- 6 Single Weapon Plaques, 4 Weapon Racks and a Display Case
- Alchemy Station complete w/Ingredient Satchels
- Small Logging Area on the front porch
- A Shrine and Secret Armoury Room
- Tool Shack
- Smelter
- Enchantment Table
- Tanning Rack
- 2 Mannequins
- Cooking Pot
- Grindstone
- Workbench
- Forge

SHORT STORY: Whitewind Cabin was previously owned by a Nord named Eran. He fled his home after being driven mad by strange occurrences. Eran's Wife recently abandoned him because she feared he was becoming mentally unstable. A few days before the Dragonborn reaches Helgan's chopping block, Eran left to seek help in the nearby City, Windhelm. Nobody has seen or heard from him since...

BASIC DESCRIPTION

An ideal home for any player. You can Fast Travel and live there instantly, after exiting Helgan's Caverns with Ralof or Hadyar. You do not have to use it as a home! If you don't like it, loot the house and carry on!
---------------------------
      Update Fixes
---------------------------

- Added more Furniture
- Added more Unique Containers
- A more detailed Exterior Landscape around Whitewind Cabin
- Added Whitewind Bow. (requested)
- Added Nord Hero Arrows to the Arrow Shelf. (requested)
- Added 2 Mannequins to the Secret Room. (requested)
- Fixed Bugs

---------------------------
      Known Bugs
---------------------------

N/A
author: xXxSyNc08
